Topic.Title: A Fly on the Wall, or An Appositional Eye

Posts.EditableText:
A Fly on the Wall, or An Appositional Eye is a new Squiffy game, classified as horror but with mystery elements. It uses audio effects and dynamic text effects.

The game takes place in a haunted mansion during a Halloween party for a group of Forteans. You need to watch monitors from the "Fly Eye," ostensibly to capture evidence of the supernatural. However, there is much more going on with this group of colorful characters. How you interpret the night's events depends on which monitors you choose to watch.

The game page is http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ci7kr7jink_ldvm6u949fg/a-fly-on-the-wall-or-an-appositional-eye

Nigel
